title: The Ghost House
description: Alyssa Carter is forced to move in with an estranged uncle after the death of her mother. She finds herself in an ancient house out in the middle of nowhere Virginia. She had always been a strange girl with unnatural white hair and no friends, but now she is surrounded by stranger things. She hears whispering and footsteps at night. The spirits of her ancestors roam the house and far worse things roam the forest surrounding them. Soon Alyssa is besieged by wicked spirits that are after her for the secret she holds and that she is only beginning to suspect.In the vein of Twilight, Fallen, and Dead Until Dark, this combines a unique woman main character with supernatural action and mystery.
author: Jane Blackthorn
